glsa.title: mpg123: Heap overflow
glsa.synopsis: A heap overflow in mpg123 was discovered, which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: mpg123 is a real time audio player designed for the MPEG format.

description.p: In httpdget.c, a variable is assigned to the heap, and is supposed to receive a smaller allocation. As this variable was not terminated properly, strncpy() will overwrite the data assigned next in memory.

impact.p: By enticing a user to visit a malicious URL, an attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running mpg123.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
